oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Synthesis of a tricyclic lactam via Beckmann rearrangement and ring-rearrangement metathesis as key steps
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KOTHA, S
RAVIKUMAR, O
MAJHI, J
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: DIELS-ALDER REACTION

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A tricyclic lactam is reported in a four step synthesis sequence via Beckmann rearrangement and ring-rearrangement metathesis as key steps. Here, we used a simple starting material such as dicyclopentadiene.
